name: Design User Interface Mockups

context: UI design and prototyping phases of product development.
details: Include layout, typography, color schemes, and interactive elements.

name: Create Design System
title: Create Design System
task: Develop a comprehensive design system with reusable UI components.
goal: Ensure consistency and efficiency across all product interfaces.
context: Design standardization and component library development.
details: Include style guides, component specifications, and usage guidelines.

name: Responsive Design Implementation
title: Responsive Design Implementation
task: Design responsive interfaces that work across different devices and screen sizes.
goal: Ensure optimal user experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
context: Multi-device application development and accessibility requirements.
details: Include breakpoints, grid systems, and adaptive layout strategies.

name: Visual Hierarchy Optimization
title: Visual Hierarchy Optimization
task: Optimize visual hierarchy to guide user attention and improve usability.
goal: Enhance user comprehension and task completion through effective design.
context: Interface refinement and usability improvement initiatives.
details: Include typography, spacing, color contrast, and element prioritization.

name: Design Handoff Documentation
title: Design Handoff Documentation
task: Create detailed design specifications for development team implementation.
goal: Ensure accurate translation of designs into functional interfaces.
details: Include asset preparation, spacing specifications, and interaction details.
